sentences: Kõigest sellest sain aime, niipea kui vähegi olin Barcelonas ringi vaadanud.
Ta on juba vaadanud kogu raamatu läbi.
Meie pere vaadanud palju kohti Eestis.
context: The word 'vaadanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'vaadata', which means 'to look' or 'to watch'. It indicates that someone has already looked at something in the past. In the example sentence from F. Tuglas, it shows how the word is used to describe having looked around Barcelona.
